sections.title: Mammoth Rider (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Mammoth Rider class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Gigantic Steed (Ex) (Mammoth Rider)
sections.description: Increases the mammoth rider's steed to Huge size with associated penalties and bonuses, and provides scaling Strength and Constitution bonuses as the rider levels up.

sections.title: Steed (Ex) (Mammoth Rider)
sections.description: Grants the mammoth rider an animal companion steed from a specific list of large creatures that functions as a druid's animal companion and stacks with other animal companion levels.

sections.title: Wild Coercion (Ex) (Mammoth Rider)
sections.description: Functions as wild empathy but can also demoralize animals and magical beasts using Intimidate mechanics, adding both Strength and Charisma modifiers to the check.

sections.title: Born Survivor (Ex) (Mammoth Rider)
sections.description: Grants bonus feats from a list of save-improving feats at 2nd and 6th levels, requiring normal prerequisites to be met.

sections.title: Colossus Hunter (Ex) (Mammoth Rider)
sections.description: Provides escalating attack and damage bonuses against creatures based on their size, with larger bonuses against bigger opponents.

sections.title: Rapid Straddle (Ex) (Mammoth Rider)
sections.description: Allows fast mounting and dismounting of steeds more than one size category larger, provided a move action is still available.

sections.title: Rugged Steed (Ex) (Mammoth Rider)
sections.description: Increases the steed's natural armor bonus by 1 at 3rd level and every 2 levels thereafter.

sections.title: Mistrust of Magic (Ex) (Mammoth Rider)
sections.description: Grants morale bonuses on saving throws against arcane, divine, or psychic spells based on which spellcasting classes the rider lacks.

sections.title: Undaunted (Ex) (Mammoth Rider)
sections.description: Adds Strength bonus to Intimidate DC against the rider and prevents size bonuses from affecting intimidation attempts against her.

sections.title: Valiant Devotion (Ex) (Mammoth Rider)
sections.description: Grants the steed a +4 morale bonus on saves against charm, compulsion, and fear effects.

sections.title: Hunter’s Instinct (Ex) (Mammoth Rider)
sections.description: Grants the ranger's quarry ability usable on any creature type, or improved quarry if the rider already has quarry from another class.

sections.title: Steed’s Reach (Ex) (Mammoth Rider)
sections.description: Increases the steed's reach to 15 feet at 7th level.

sections.title: Combined Might (Ex) (Mammoth Rider)
sections.description: Once per round during a mounted charge, adds half the steed's Strength bonus to the rider's melee damage roll.

sections.title: Pulverizing Assault (Ex) (Mammoth Rider)
sections.description: When directing the steed to charge or use special attacks, the first damage dealt forces a Fortitude save or the target becomes staggered for 1d4 rounds.

sections.title: Mammoth Lord (Ex) (Mammoth Rider)
sections.description: Grants immunity to multiple conditions, improved evasion for Fort/Will saves, and a stunning effect when both rider and steed hit the same target.
